授業目的: The aim of this course is to equip students with the skills and confidence necessary to research, plan and compose an academic paper.
到達目標: The aim of this course is to equip students with the skills and confidence necessary to research, plan and compose an academic paper.
特記事項:
本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。
The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
授業方法: Students can only learn by being involved. The instructor will guide but it is up to the student to observe and learn.

第1回:
Introduction to the course, explanation of the syllabus, and grading policies.
Overview of the fundamentals of academic writing.
You will work on topic selection and information gathering strategies.
第2回: We will focus on brainstorming and topic mapping skills.
第3回:
(You must print out and bring a copy of your Essay 1, Draft 1 to class.)
You will exchange papers with your classmates and exchange peer feedback.
We will focus on the overall essay organization.
第4回: We will focus on definitions and defining paragraphs.
第5回:
(You must print out and bring a copy of your Essay 1, Draft 2 to class.)
You will exchange papers with your classmates and exchange peer feedback.
We will focus on linking words and phrases.
第6回: We will focus on two patterns: moving from general to specific and from specific to general.
第7回:
(You must print out and bring a copy of your Essay 1, Final Version to class.)
You will do a peer evaluation of your classmate's papers using an evaluation rubric.
We will focus on the styles of common academic essay types: comparison, expository, process, etc.
第8回: We will focus on data description and data commentary.
第9回:
(You must print out and bring a copy of your Essay 2, Draft 1 to class.)
You will exchange papers with your classmates and exchange peer feedback.
We will focus on highlighting statements.
第10回: We will focus on dealing with graphs, tables, and visuals.
第11回:
(You must print out and bring a copy of your Essay 2, Draft 2 to class.)
You will exchange papers with your classmates and exchange peer feedback.
We will focus on using quotes and references.
第12回: We will focus on giving opinions and making claims.
第13回:
(You must print out and bring a copy of your Essay 2, Draft 3 to class.)
You will exchange papers with your classmates and exchange peer feedback.
We will focus on editing techniques and how to format a reference list.
第14回:
( you must print out and bring a copy of Essay, 2, Final Version to class.)
You will do a peer evaluation of your classmate's papers using an evaluation rubric.
Debriefing of what was learned during the semester.
